name: Monster Typer
description:
Monster Typer is a fast-paced, zany typing game for everyone with simple controls (typing) and easy to learn (hard to master) mechanics.

You play as a human scientist codenamed "Player" researching and finding out the newly discovered planet "Earth-3"'s viability for human colonization. Armed with a "Typer Pistol", you collect data from the monsters inhabiting the planet.

 Systems

L. U. C. K. (Luck's Unconditional Chaos and Kindness) - A slot machine system placed to spice things up.

Awesome Top 10 - Online leaderboard for bragging rights. (Thinking of a weekly reset of the leaderboard)

Monster Log - Lore stuff.

Current status: Mid-Alpha Early Access

zilchdear
